sentences.en: " It's as if you couldn't really be happy unless you were unlucky.
sentences.cn: 你好像存着心非倒霉不痛快似的.

sentences.en: But the unlucky suggestion met with fierce and unanimous opposition.
sentences.cn: 然而这个倒霉的建议遭到了激烈而一致的反对.

sentences.en: During the contest an unlucky occurrence hurt his cause exceedingly.
sentences.cn: 争论中,不幸发生的事极大地损害了他的事业.

sentences.en: He is always unlucky in love.
sentences.cn: 他在恋爱方面总是运气不佳.

sentences.en: He was very unlucky not to win.
I am unlucky enough to miss the last train.
sentences.cn: 我真倒霉,错过了最后一班火车.

sentences.en: I'm not a going to be made unlucky by your sneaking.
sentences.cn: 我不能让你叽叽咕咕祈祷得我倒了霉.

sentences.en: If he is unlucky, he may find that his ex-partner denies him access to his children.
sentences.cn: 如果不走运的话，他可能会发现前妻拒绝让他接近自己的孩子。

sentences.en: It is ridiculously absurd to believe that the number 13 is unlucky.
sentences.cn: 相信数字13是个不吉祥的数字是荒唐可笑的.

sentences.en: It's a common superstition that black cats are unlucky.
sentences.cn: 认为黑猫不吉祥是一种很普遍的迷信.

sentences.en: Little insects were often unlucky and got stuck in this sap.
sentences.cn: 一些小昆虫常常不幸粘到了松脂里.

sentences.en: Others were unlucky victims of falling debris.
sentences.cn: 其他人都是不幸被坠落的瓦砾残片所伤。

sentences.en: Some people say it is unlucky to break a mirror.
sentences.cn: 有些人说打碎镜子是不吉利的.

sentences.en: Some people think black cats are unlucky.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为黑猫不吉利。

sentences.en: Some people think it is unlucky to look at a new moon through glass.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为透过玻璃看新月是不吉利的。

sentences.en: Thierry Henry was desperately unlucky not to score when his shot hit the post.
sentences.cn: 蒂埃里·亨利太不走运了，射门没进，球打中了门柱。
